data.message: Will the real slim shady please stand up?

replies.message: I miss his music without collabs
Yes
Kary ? 🙂
Tim Tebow is overrated
😂😂 agree, what is this shit!
Yea the “real slim shady” died long ago.    Shit just ain’t the same
Guess who's back? Guess who's back? Guess who's back? Guess who's back? Guess who's back?  (Without me)
He's 45 his content is going to be more mature lol he ain't on drugs and mid 20s anymore, dude bar for bar would still out rap anyone
Trevor Jones Then go listen to it.
w/ Beyoncé?  Really?
You're happy you got attention.. as is slim , just not like you.

Dylan Thompson yea but if it weren’t for the fucked up shit he wouldn’t be where he is today and nobody would pay him the first 2 cents.    Just because all the clowns u here on the radio suck don’t mean there isn’t better out there
Ronie Gallagher it was god aweful, i didnt make it through the song
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bzo8WKyCRJc
I love when people reference his sellout radio garbage as his “best work” . Go bump some Macklemore
Harish Lunu tu dalbajobas
People are always complaining. These are the same people who think mumble rap is good content.
We're gonna have a problem here
He def didnt stand up in this song
Mumble rap is terrible bit so are all his colavs with shitty pop stars.. This song is down right horrible for eminem... And only real fans wont be afraid to say that

Jason Cooney I don’t even know who macmore is.   The slim lp marshal mathers lp and maybe encore.....those where slims hay days.  That’s what the real slim shady fans liked and I’m sure many more like me kinda just quit buying the trash” that went mainstream and all over the radio with all the bull shit collabs” not referring to his latest stunt but dude is a sell out now.   He’s not pleasing his real fans where where bumping that shit back in 99 and people where stunned with the shit that canes out of his mouth.    Point being yea he can still rap and flow but he lost touch and lost a lot of fans.
Back when he was on the chronic 2001 with Dre.    Yea kids don’t even remember that shit
It is a single!!! Of course he's going to get Beyonce in to promote his album. Get a grip
As soon as I listened to this song I went straight to his old shit. This song is trash but hopefully the rest won't be like this.
